resources:
Call Of Nature Did Nature Call You Today? Did nature call you more than once today?
ABOUT
Call of Nature is a simple mobile application developed by Brielle Romero for her final project in her Mobile Programming class. This app is intended to track the times when nature calls.
HOW TO USE
This app is as simple as it sounds. It asks you if nature called you today. You simply respond yes or no. Tap profile if you want to see a log of all the times you\'ve been called by nature.
// MAIN SIGN IN REGISTER LOGIN Username Password Confirm Password
// DASHBOARD YES NO PROFILE HELP SETTINGS
BACK TO MENU DELETE ALL DATA LOG OUT
